name: Giant Friend
description:
Giant Friend

Made for Ludum Dare 38

You play as a giant carrot guy. Stomp your way into the city and find a snack. Step on things to cause property damage.

Instructions:

Cause as much property damage as possible and reach the goal before time runs out to continue!

WASD: Move target
Q & E: Rotate target
Space: Stomp

You can only move the target so far before you have to stomp again.

Post Jam Update: https://fixedgerald.itch.io/giant-friend-post-jam

Ludum Dare Entry: https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/38/giant-frien...

http://spencerlarkin.com/
